page.title: 10MANOR HOUSE CONT
page.content: We went into the kitchen.There was a large fireplace and stone floor,and a passage leading to a room where the servants worked. Then we went to the second floor. There were 3 rooms and the floor was very unlevel.We went into the first room and there was a door where you could go on to a balcony. Lizzie opened the door to go on the balcony, but Louise said it was not safe to go on. Then we went in the next two rooms. They both had windows and about 3 beds in them.Then we went in the garden. There were high walls all around it and there were box hedges and a passage leading to the moat. Then Louise took the key back and we went round the back of the walls and we met Louise on the other side. (E.Rushforth & E.Payne).
